title: Bell partners with AI company Cohere in latest step to grow tech service offerings
description: MONTREAL — Bell Canada has announced a partnership with artificial intelligence company Cohere to provide full-stack sovereign AI solutions for government and enterprise customers across Canada.
content:

title: Meta names ChatGPT co‑creator Shengjia Zhao as chief scientist of AI Superintelligence Lab
description: Just a month after poaching three OpenAI researchers, Meta is doubling down on its artificial intelligence ambitions with another heavyweight hire. On Friday, CEO Mark Zuckerberg announced that Shengjia Zhao, the co-creator of ChatGPT and one of the key minds behind GPT-4, is officially serving as the chief scientist of Meta’s newly formed Superintelligence Labs.
content: Just a month after poaching three OpenAI researchers, Meta is doubling down on its artificial intelligence ambitions with another heavyweight hire. On Friday, CEO Mark Zuckerberg announced that Shengjia Zhao, the co-creator of ChatGPT and one of the ... [3053 chars]

title: Why women are wary of the AI rush
description: New technology has always been used against women. Why should we trust artificial intelligence not to be?
content:
It’s here. It’s there. Everywhere you look, AI.
Each Google search returns a lengthy AI summary before providing links to relevant search results. Chatbots pop up as soon as you go online to make flight reservations or pay a credit card bill. Start w... [9659 chars]

title: Paterson warns government not to put a handbrake on AI
description: The shadow finance spokesman acknowledged the Coalition got it wrong over an election pledge, and warned the government not to stymie artificial intelligence.
content: Opposition finance spokesman James Paterson has issued a mea culpa over the Coalition’s election pledge to gut the public service and signalled a more respectful relationship, while also making clear business has a role to play in government service ... [292 chars]
